snippet.title: The Unbeatable Path - A First Person Horror Adventure - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
The Unbeatable Path is an immersive first-person horror adventure in which you have to solve riddles and puzzles in a hellish environment. While doing so you will unveil the story of Mia and find out why she was finally driven to taking her own life. Will you change her story for the better?

The game will be released on Steam on April 06, 2023.
Add it to your wishlist now and get notified immediately upon release:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1339340/The_Unbeatable_Path/
